channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- susu-sum node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- susu-sum node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16199|2024-08-05T20:20:05.416Z -- hackerone -- susu-sum%20node%20module
item.description: susu-sum is a static file server. susu-sum is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.
